issues.description: The constructor parameters in the solution are declared in the order (lectureName, numberOfLecturers, numberOfTutors, numberOfInscribedStudents, numberOfGuestStudents), but the problem statementâ€™s UML specifies the order (lectureName, numberOfInscribedStudents, numberOfGuestStudents, numberOfLecturers, numberOfTutors). This mismatch will confuse students and break tests expecting the UML order.
issues.suggested_fix: Reorder the constructor parameters in the solution to (String lectureName, int numberOfInscribedStudents, int numberOfGuestStudents, int numberOfLecturers, int numberOfTutors) to match the UML and problem specification.
